<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return a reference to the substring from &#91;Start, Start + N).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Start The index of the starting character in the substring; if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the index is npos or greater than the length of the string then the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// empty substring will be returned.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param N The number of characters to included in the substring. If \\p N</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// exceeds the number of characters remaining in the string, the string</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// suffix (starting with \\p Start) will be returned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring/#abab69c8e9372f6a5283db4a059b8d5a0"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring/#abab69c8e9372f6a5283db4a059b8d5a0">substr</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Start,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Start The index of the starting character in the substring; if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the index is npos or greater than the length of the string then the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// empty substring will be returned.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param End The index following the last character to include in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// substring. If this is npos, or less than \\p Start, or exceeds the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// number of characters remaining in the string, the string suffix</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (starting with \\p Start) will be returned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
